MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY12 postcode area of Dunfermline, affecting properties in Queen Anne Street and surrounding streets. Our engineers have arrived at the local substation and are investigating a suspected blown fuse. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:58am on Friday, 16 October 2020
